mapper.select: SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(t.exam_date,'%Y-%m-%d') examDate,DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time,'%H:%i') startTime,DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%H:%i') endTime, t.subject_id subjectId,a.name subjectName FROM t_exam_arrange t left join t_subject a on t.subject_id=a.subject_id where t.exam_id=#{0} and t.grade_id=#{1} order by t.exam_date,t.start_time

select t.arrange_id as arrangeId,t.exam_id as examId,t.grade_id as gradeId, t.subject_id as subjectId,t.group_id as groupId ,t.exam_date as examDate, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime,a.`NAME` as subjectName from t_exam_arrange t left join t_subject a on t.SUBJECT_ID = a.SUBJECT_ID where t.exam_id = #{0} and t.grade_id =#{1} and t.subject_id =#{2}

select t.arrange_id as arrangeId,t.exam_id as examId,t.grade_id as gradeId, t.subject_id as subjectId,t.group_id as groupId ,t.exam_date as examDate, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime,a.`NAME` as subjectName from t_exam_arrange t left join t_subject a on t.SUBJECT_ID = a.SUBJECT_ID where t.exam_id = #{0} and t.grade_id =#{1}

select t.arrange_id as arrangeId,t.exam_id as examId,t.grade_id as gradeId, t.subject_id as subjectId,t.group_id as groupId ,t.exam_date as examDate, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime from t_exam_arrange t where t.exam_id = #{0} and t.grade_id =#{1} and t.group_id is null
